projects.title: Invoice App
projects.body: CRUD app integrating Pinia state management and Firebase for storing and retrieving data.

projects.title: Anime App
projects.body: Responsive Vue.js SPA app using the Composition API, which integrates an Anime DB API. It allows users to search for anime titles, view details on specific anime, and create their own anime list. The app utilizes routing to provide a seamless user experience.
projects.technologies: Vue.js, JavaScript, API, Sass, Responsive Design

projects.title: Landing Page
projects.body: Responsive Landing page for an imaginary hosting company.

projects.title: Book Library
projects.body: App meant to help keep track of book collection thanks to the implemented various filter functions.
